PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07902010-06-17,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectNew Harmonized Value-added Tax System Regulations, No. 2 (Special Edition-2010-06-30)
PrecisNEW HARMONIZED VALUE-ADDED TAX SYSTEM REGULATIONS, No. 2 are required as a consequence of Canadaâ€™s Comprehensive Integrated Tax Co-ordination Agreements (CITCAs) with Ontario and British Columbia. The Regulations formalize and give legal force to the previously released real property, ITC recapture and HST self-assessment and rebate rules as well as introduce other rules to ensure that the provincial component of the HST applies properly.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0151 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
